text: Peter Burmeister (16 July 1941 â€“ 20 January 2019) was a German mathematician. He was a professor of mathematics at Darmstadt University of Technology. He was born in Berlin, Germany. Burmeister died on 20 January 2019 in Reinheim, Germany at the age of 77. == References == Category:1941 births Category:2019 deaths Category:German mathematicians Category:People from Berlin
title: Peter Burmeister
